name: RepairNA
description:
Play this rhythmic key-puncher, combining the nucleobases in order to save the patient's mutated DNA. Time the moment the nucleobase reaches the polymerase and hit the correct key to synthesise the proper opposing nucleobase.

Enough with the 'science', enjoy this fast-paced, button-mashing, deep-focus game!

This game has been created during the Polyjam2020 Event
